lead_paragraph: Russia was responsible for more doping violations than any other nation in 2014 while track and field was the sport with the worst doping record over the year, the World Anti-Doping Agency said.
snippet: Russia was responsible for more doping violations than any other nation in 2014 while track and field was the sport with the worst doping record over the year, the World Anti-Doping Agency said.
abstract: World Anti-Doping Agency reports that Russia tops its list of doping offenders for 2014, and that track and field had worst doping record among all sports for year.
